column4: Can one use the KDE4 menu system in Gnome? I like the search and ect which gnomes menu lacks, the menu system in gnome is very windows 98
you could boot to gnome and run kicker
i think the apps you run will be captured by the gnome panels
you can use the LiveCD to reinstate the MBR easily
it doesn't boot my install disk anymore.. had a USB disk to boot from.. now it only gets black screen and blinking cursor
what GPU do you use?
it's a Nvidia
add the boot option:  nouveau.blacklist=1
problem is that I don't even get that far so I can adjust the boot options
you do, you just need to know how
grub is on the CD, which then loads the OS.
I advised nouveau.blacklist=1    did I not?
set different TCP_SOCKET options in /etc/samba/smb.conf
Explain a little closer what u mean..  what diffrent should I set and how does it affect speed?
there are a tonne of options you can add, there are sampls online, you change them on the server side, you'll need to restart the smbd service to apply the settings'
the module it uses may have the option to disable power management
Yeah, I can easily turn it off with iwconfig eth0 power off but I want it in boot so I dont have to do it manually every time
add it in /etc/rc.local above the exit 0 line
ok so putting "/sbin/iwconfig eth0 power off" in rc.local should do the trick?
yeah should do
all I can say is try it
